Description: Used to aggregate suspended particles into larger flocs that settle out in sedimentation tanks.
A strong oxidizer used to kill bacteria and viruses in water to ensure safety.
Chemicals like sodium hydroxide (base) or sulfuric acid (acid) to correct water pH levels.
